pages.text: Fedomia mikhaili comes from the Upper Ediacaran, with fossils found from the White Sea, Russia. It is a possible sponge-like lifeform that could grow up to 10 cm in height. The generic and specific names derive from Mikhail A. Fedonkin, a well known Ediacaran paleontologist.
